resources.string: Welcome! Run Planner creates unique training plans for runners of all different experience levels, training for all types of distances. Please choose one of the options below to get started.

If you need to uninstall the app, it is highly recommended to delete all training plans first. If you do not do this, you will need to do it through Google Calendar, which could potentially take a long time.\n\n Thanks again for using Run Planner and please send all feedback to runplannerapp@gmail.com
Please enter a name for your training plan.
Please select the race you are training for.
Please select your current experience level.
Please select the date of your race.
Choose to create plan on dedicated calendar or your own.

Thanks again for trying out Run Planner. I hope it has provided you with an easy and effective tool for planning your training. I sure have had a great time building it. Again if you have any feedback, feel free to leave a review or send an email to runplannerapp@gmail.com.

Happy running!
- Ryan
